original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business needs and technical implementation, requiring a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency. As a key player in our organization, you will be responsible for understanding complex business processes and translating them into effective system configurations that drive efficiency and accuracy. Your focus will be on developing new processes and leveraging cutting-edge technologies, such as machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), to deliver innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data.
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and participate in user acceptance testing (UAT).
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps.
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective technical solutions.
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively liaise with stakeholders from various departments and backgrounds.
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Preferred Skills:
- Proficiency in Java programming language to enhance your ability to work with the [mention specific system] backend.
- Expertise in SQL to efficiently query and analyze data from databases.

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated experience in implementing and leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies to drive innovative solutions.

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with Agile methodologies to collaborate effectively in a fast-paced, iterative environment.
- Background in the vehicle configuration domain to provide a deeper understanding of the business context.

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- Databases and data analysis tools
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder interactions.
- Ability to work in an Agile, iterative development process with a focus on continuous improvement.
- Willingness to stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies to enhance your contributions.

Role Overview:
This role is a unique opportunity to blend your technical expertise with a deep understanding of business processes and requirements. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for translating complex business needs into effective system configurations that drive efficiency, accuracy, and innovation within the vehicle configuration space. Your ability to leverage cutting-edge technologies, such as machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), will be instrumental in developing and implementing transformative solutions.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, using techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows to document them clearly and concisely.
- Utilize your technical proficiency to configure and maintain our [mention specific system] backend, ensuring it accurately reflects the business needs.
- Develop and maintain configuration specifications, create and modify data mappings and integrations, implement and test new configurations, and troubleshoot any configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to verify they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT).
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements.
- Serve as a technical liaison, working closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business requirements and translate them into effective technical solutions.
- Strong communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to engage with stakeholders from diverse backgrounds and effectively convey technical information in a clear, concise manner.
- Proficiency in translating complex technical concepts into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Preferred Skills:
- Expertise in Java programming language to enhance your ability to work with the [mention specific system] backend.
- Familiarity with SQL to efficiently query and analyze data from databases.

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successfully implementing and leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies to drive innovative solutions.

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile, iterative development environment to collaborate effectively and adapt to changing requirements.
- Background in the vehicle configuration domain to provide a deeper understanding of the business context and industry best practices.

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- Databases and data analysis tools
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder interactions and a focus on continuous improvement.
- Ability to work in an Agile, iterative development process, demonstrating flexibility and a proactive approach to problem-solving.
- Commitment to staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies to enhance your contributions and drive innovation.

Role Overview:
This role is a unique opportunity to leverage your technical expertise and business acumen to drive transformative solutions within the vehicle configuration space. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for translating complex business requirements into effective system configurations that optimize efficiency, accuracy, and innovation. Your ability to collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders and leverage cutting-edge technologies, such as machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), will be instrumental in delivering impactful results.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage in in-depth discussions with stakeholders from various departments to understand their unique business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Utilize your technical proficiency to configure and maintain our [mention specific system] backend, ensuring it accurately reflects the evolving business requirements.
- Develop and maintain comprehensive configuration specifications, create and modify data mappings and integrations, implement and test new configurations, and troubleshoot any configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and the adoption of industry best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to verify they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to ensure a seamless user experience.
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements.
- Serve as a technical liaison, working closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business requirements and translate them into effective technical solutions.
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to engage with stakeholders from diverse backgrounds and effectively convey technical information in a clear, concise, and engaging manner.
- Proficiency in translating complex technical concepts into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Preferred Skills:
- Expertise in Java programming language to enhance your ability to work with the [mention specific system] backend.
- Proficiency in SQL to efficiently query and analyze data from databases.

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successfully implementing and leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies to drive innovative and impactful solutions.

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile, iterative development environment, demonstrating the ability to adapt to changing requirements and collaborate effectively.
- Background in the vehicle configuration domain to provide a deeper understanding of the business context and industry best practices.

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- Databases and data analysis tools
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder interactions and a focus on continuous improvement.
- Ability to work in an Agile, iterative development process, demonstrating flexibility, a proactive approach to problem-solving, and a commitment to delivering high-quality results.
- Dedication to staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies to enhance your contributions and drive innovation within the organization.
